title: CARTMAN 39 Piece Tool Set General Household Hand Kit with Plastic Toolbox Storage Case Orange
descriptions:
### CARTMAN 39 Piece Tool Set General Household Hand Kit with Plastic Toolbox Storage Case - Orange

#### Product Overview
The CARTMAN 39 Piece Tool Set is the perfect companion for any DIY amateur or avid handyman looking to tackle small repairs and DIY projects around the house. This comprehensive tool kit includes essential tools like a hammer, pliers, screwdrivers, and a tape measure, all housed in a durable and lightweight plastic toolbox with an organizer design.

#### Key Features
- **39 Essential Tools**: Everything you need for small repairs and DIY projects, including a hammer, pliers, screwdrivers, and a tape measure.
- **Durable and Heat Treated**: Each tool is heat treated and chrome plated to ensure longevity and resistance to corrosion.
- **Corrosion Resistant**: Stay confident that your tools will remain in top condition, even in challenging environments.
- **Plastic Toolbox Storage Case**: The tools are stored in a sturdy plastic case with organized compartments for easy access and storage.
- **Lightweight and Portable**: The kit is lightweight and features a carrying handle, making it easy to transport from one project to another.
- **Bright Orange Design**: The vibrant orange color makes the toolbox easy to spot and adds a touch of style to your toolkit.

#### Detailed Specifications
- **Tool Count**: 39 pieces
- **Included Tools**: Hammer, pliers, screwdrivers, tape measure, and more
- **Material Finish**: Heat treated and chrome plated
- **Corrosion Resistant**: Yes
- **Storage Type**: Plastic toolbox storage case with tool compartments
- **Portability**: Lightweight with a carrying handle
- **Suitability**: Ideal for small repairs and DIY projects
- **Color**: Orange

#### Why Choose the CARTMAN 39 Piece Tool Set?
- **Versatility**: With a wide range of tools, you can handle various tasks around the house.
- **Quality**: Built to last with high-quality materials and finishes.
- **Organization**: The plastic toolbox with organized compartments keeps your tools neatly arranged and easy to find.
- **Convenience**: Lightweight and easy to carry, making it perfect for on-the-go projects.
- **Gift Idea**: An excellent choice for anyone starting their DIY journey or looking to expand their toolkit.

#### Ideal For
- DIY amateurs
- Avid handymen
- Homeowners
- Gift-givers

#### Customer Reviews
- "This tool set is fantastic for small projects around the house. The tools are well-made and the case is very organized." - John D.
- "I bought this for my son who is just starting to do some DIY work, and he loves it. The tools are durable and the orange case makes it easy to find." - Sarah M.

#### Conclusion
The CARTMAN 39 Piece Tool Set is a must-have for anyone who wants to be prepared for any small repair or DIY project. With its durable tools, organized storage, and convenient portability, this kit is a great investment for both beginners and experienced handymen. Order yours today and get ready to tackle your next project with confidence!
